mapper.select: SELECT jylsh AS id, wjy, '20' + SUBSTRING(jylsh, 8, 6) AS riqi, hphm, clpp1, jylb FROM pda_db.dbo.AC_DATA_WG WHERE (wjy IS NOT NULL)
SELECT jylsh AS id, wjy, '20' + SUBSTRING(jylsh, 8, 6) AS riqi, hphm, clpp1, jylb FROM pda_db.dbo.AC_DATA_WG WHERE (wjy IS NOT NULL) and wjy like concat('%', #{wjy },'%')
